r:storage-data-source.r:cmd: SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT TOP 1 os.Name FROM OrganizationSnap os WHERE os.Anchor = oa.ObjectID ORDER BY os.DateTime DESC) AS Name FROM OrganizationAnchor oa WHERE ObjectID = @Organization

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT osh.DateTime, su.Login AS SystemUser, osh.[Exists], NULL AS [StructureHasDefined], NULL AS [ExternalID], NULL AS [Name], NULL AS [ShortName], NULL AS [Director] FROM OrganizationAnchor oa JOIN OrganizationStatusHistory osh ON osh.Anchor = oa.ObjectID JOIN SystemUser su ON su.ObjectID = osh.SystemUser WHERE oa.ObjectID = @Organization ) UNION ALL ( SELECT os.DateTime, su.Login AS SystemUser, NULL AS [Exists], os.[StructureHasDefined], os.[ExternalID], os.[Name], os.[ShortName], d.[LastName] + ' ' + d.[FirstName] + ISNULL(' ' + d.[MiddleName], '') AS [Director] FROM OrganizationAnchor oa JOIN OrganizationSnap os ON os.Anchor = oa.ObjectID JOIN SystemUser su ON su.ObjectID = os.SystemUser LEFT JOIN Employee d ON d.ObjectID = os.Director WHERE oa.ObjectID = @Organization ) ) t ORDER BY t.DateTime
